_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Azure Pipeline Agent v3.214.0
author: yannick@netdb.at
description: Allows your to host your Azure Pipeline Self-Hosted Agent on Pterodactyl

installation.script:
#!/bin/sh
cd /mnt/server
dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt update -y
apt upgrade -y
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Install required packages..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
apt install -y apt-transport-https wget iproute2 curl tar ca-certificates
wget https://packages.microsoft.com/config/ubuntu/22.10/packages-microsoft-prod.deb -O packages-microsoft-prod.deb
dpkg -i packages-microsoft-prod.deb
rm packages-microsoft-prod.deb
apt update -y
apt install -y dotnet-runtime-6.0
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed"
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Install azure devops agent..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
curl -O -J -L https://vstsagentpackage.azureedge.net/agent/3.214.0/vsts-agent-linux-x64-3.214.0.tar.gz
tar xzf vsts-agent-linux-x64-3.214.0.tar.gz
export AGENT_ALLOW_RUNASROOT="1"
./config.sh --unattended --acceptTeeEula --url ${SERVER_URL} --auth PAT --token ${PAT} --pool ${POOL_NAME} --agent ${AGENT_NAME}
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed"
echo "-----------------------------------------"
